behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Variation ID used when calculating the action ID.

turnVellocity.Wiki: Rotational speed [degrees / second] that can turn in 1 second.

hitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

hitYOffset.Wiki: Offset of the model display position in the Y (height) direction. It can be floated from the hit position.

getSoul.Wiki: The amount of soul that a character can get at the time of death.

itemLotId_1.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

itemLotId_2.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

itemLotId_3.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

itemLotId_4.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

itemLotId_5.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

itemLotId_6.Wiki: Itemlot ID to be dropped upon death

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: Special effect ID for lap bonus

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: Set the damage cut rate when guarding for each attack

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: If it is not a guard attack, enter 0

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the fire attack?

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: How much to cut the electric shock attack?

animIdOffset.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the original anime ID is referenced.

spMoveAnimId1.Wiki: Special movement animation parameter reference ID

spMoveAnimId2.Wiki: Special movement animation parameter reference ID

networkWarpDist.Wiki: Distance to warp instead of complementary movement in network synchronization. Faster people (ex dragons) need to be longer.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: Register the ID from the action parameter tool and specify the action.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: All animations will be played with IDs shifted by this number. If not, the animation ID of the animation ID offset 1 is referred to.

resist_curse.Wiki: Difficulty in dealing with abnormal curse conditions

ghostModelId.Wiki: Replacement model when wandering ghost, texture ID

normalChangeResouceId.Wiki: Replace resource ID during normal operation (do not use it unnecessarily)

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense range angle when guarding weapons. Pending

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: Normal replacement texture character ID (do not use it unnecessarily)

dropType.Wiki: Display method when dropping an item (corpse emission or item display)

teamType.Wiki: Determines enemy\ally\aggro\damage status in relation to other teams.

material.Wiki: Sound played by material when damaged.

materialSfx.Wiki: SFX played by material when damaged.

material_Weak.AltName: Material SE - Damaged in Weak Spot
material_Weak.Wiki: Sound played by material when damaged in weak spot.

materialSfx_Weak.AltName: Material SFX - Damaged in Weak Spot
materialSfx_Weak.Wiki: SFX played by material when damaged in weak spot.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Determines if weak parts (such as the head) will be affected by all attacks or just arrow attacks.\nHeadshot animation will be used for weak part attacks if it exists.

guardLevel.Wiki: Determines guard hit anim used depending on incoming damageLevel.

parryAttack.Wiki: If this is greater than defender's Parry Defense, the attack cannot be parried.

parryDefence.Wiki: If this is equal to or greater than attacker's Parry Attack, the attack can be parried.

sfxSize.Wiki: Determines which version of a SpEffect's VFX to use (i.e. bigger poison clouds on bigger enemies).

hitStopType.Wiki: Setting whether to perform hit stop processing

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: Upper side of the ladder end judgment offset

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: Lower side of ladder end judgment offset

useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: Does the camera hit the enemy ragdoll? (Valid only when hitting the player)

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If you want to prevent the cross rigid from hitting you

useUndulationAddAnimFB.Wiki: Whether to use front and back undulation addition

isDemon.Wiki: Special attack A? Special attack A damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isGhost.Wiki: The opponent's attack will be able to slip through. The attack hits only when the anti-spirit weapon of the weapon para is attacked with the weapon of . Be careful not to confuse it with a wandering ghost

isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: Do you not play the damage motion when the damage is 0?

isUnduration.Wiki: Do you match the back and forth rotation of the character with the undulations of the ground? Cannot be used for flying characters

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: Will it be a wandering ghost when the player is a client?

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: Do you want to enable the swing set in Param Weaver?

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: Do you want to play the moving animation until the animation is over? (Like a mayfly dragon.)

isCrowd.Wiki: Do you want to reduce the processing load during crowds? For babies (preferably phalanx)

isWeakSaint.Wiki: Special attack B? Special attack B damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakA.Wiki: Special attack C? Special attack C damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

isWeakB.Wiki: Special attack D? Special attack D damage multiplier will be included in the calculation

vowType.Wiki:
Determines Vow ID depending on permutation of flags.
ABC
000 - Vow 0
100 - Vow 1
010 - Vow 2
110 - Vow 3
001 - Vow 4
101 - Vow 5
011 - Vow 6
111 - Vow 7

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If you do not make an initial death, TRUE, even if you kill and save it, the corpse will not be reproduced.

isSoulGetByBoss.Wiki: Do you get a boss in soul?

modelDispMask16.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask17.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask18.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask19.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask20.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask21.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask22.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask23.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask24.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask25.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask26.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask27.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask28.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask29.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask30.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask31.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

itemSearchRadius.Wiki: Radius to be added as a correction to the cylinder radius of normal Item search judgment (applicable to enemy drop items. Used for large characters etc.)

subHitOffset.Wiki: Offset distance from the parent capsule to the rear direction

subHitHeight.Wiki: The height of the capsule per character.

normalChangeAnimChrId.Wiki: Replace the target animation with the specified ID Anibnd
